Name: Alchemy Shop
About the game: trying to make a living in a world full of magic and dangerous monsters, you decided to open your own alchemy shop and profit off of the wants and needs of various villagers and adventurers. with a recipe book in hand and a little dragon friend at your side you struggle onward. combine ingredients. make alchemical creations. complete customer orders. upgrade your shop. unlock new recipes and creations. make more money. you can make a lot of money selling to those in need, but can you keep up with all of the different recipes you will need to complete and all of the demands of the impatient customers?
